mapper.select: SELECT e.dealer_name,d.order_no,d.id as orderId,c.brand_name,c.brand_series_name AS series_name, c.brand_series_product_name AS product_name,b.user_name,a.goods_out_time FROM l_ser_warehouse_goods_out_info a LEFT JOIN t_sys_user_info b ON a.user_id = b.id LEFT JOIN t_ser_goods_info c ON a.box_no = c.m5 LEFT JOIN t_ser_order_info d ON a.order_id = d.id LEFT JOIN t_ser_dealer_info e ON d.dealer_id = e.id WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY e.dealer_name,d.order_no,d.id,c.brand_name,c.brand_series_name, c.brand_series_product_name,b.user_name,a.goods_out_time limit #{page},#{limit}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.order_id) FROM l_ser_warehouse_goods_out_info a

SELECT e.dealer_name,d.order_no,d.id as orderId,c.brand_name,c.brand_series_name as series_name, c.brand_series_product_name as product_name,c.brand_series_product_id as prodId,c.id as goodsId,c.M1 as prCode FROM l_ser_warehouse_goods_out_info a LEFT JOIN t_ser_goods_info c ON a.box_no = c.m5 LEFT JOIN t_ser_order_info d ON a.order_id = d.id LEFT JOIN t_ser_dealer_info e ON d.dealer_id = e.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.order_id = #{orderNo}
select count(DISTINCT a.box_no) from l_ser_warehouse_goods_out_info a where a.warehouse_id = #{warehouseId}
select count(DISTINCT a.box_no) from l_ser_warehouse_goods_out_info a where a.order_id = #{orderId}
